segments.text: I glance at the kitchen, and I'm taken aback by what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is full to the brim, water spilling over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just gushing out, forming a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying the plate hasn't noticed a thing; that's shocking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron look so proper, yet she's in the middle of this flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, a boy's on a stool that's tilting dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand in the cookie jar, pulling out treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect the little girl to be involved, reaching up for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet doors are wide open, framing the whole sneaky operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window highlights the garden, so calm compared to inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who knew a simple kitchen could hide so much action?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed; it's a miracle it hasn't tipped yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This drawing caught me off guard with all these details.
segments.speaker: PAR
